page.title: 18PRIMARY SCHOOL WELLS
page.content: My Grandad is the Caretaker for Wells Primary School. He's done the job since 1969. When I went to the Primary I went to see him after school. Here's what he does in a day. a.m. 6.00 He gets up 7.00 He goes to work 9.00 Goes home for breakfast 10.00 He goes back to work p.m. 12.00 He goes home for dinner (sometimes he has it at school) 1.00 Goes back to school 6.00 He goes home His job is cleaning the classrooms, the toilets and getting tennis balls from the roofs and from underneath the mobile classrooms. He has 2 ladies to help him. The infants recently gave him a scrapbook with pictures of him.
